text: Hi Turing developers. I think an compliment is in order. I’m now halfway moving the StatisticalRethinkingJulia models over to a static site and most models run in about 10 seconds (!!). Yes, “using Turing” takes ages, but I’m still impressed with the speed! Thanks for all the work

text: <@U016VPLD0MT> is working on a set of benchmarks for Turing, Stan and other PPLs. Maybe this can be included as part of the benchmarks?

text:
Hi <@U01BTNDCUBX>. As <@UCRDHV7PB> mentioned, I'm working on some benchmarks and would love to include models from <https://github.com/StatisticalRethinkingJulia/StatisticalRethinkingTuring.jl>

If it makes sense, I would love to chat about how this could be done. Feel free to DM me.

text: Re benchmarks: are there any plans to integrate with either <https://github.com/facebookresearch/pplbench> or <https://github.com/MansMeg/posteriordb>? I remember that at PROBPROG Google also announced their own PPL benchmarking tool but I can't find it anymore..
